name: Great Alhcemist
description:
Great Alchemist is a classic 3-in-a-row puzzle game.

1346. The plague is raging in Euroba, and millions of people are dying out.
Take on the role of a medieval doctor, an alchemist, and try to cure people. Conditionally, each level is a person who has fallen ill with the "Black death" the severity of the disease is also different for everyone, and the conditions for healing the patient will differ, becoming more complicated each time.
Over time, you will open new tools to fight diseases, they will help a lot, but you need to keep track of time, the life of the patient hangs in the balance, delay will cost him his life.

Features:
-30 levels
-Colorful graphics
- Dark but melodic ambient
- multi-level progress
- free game mode
